messages.content: I don't date women who smoke. As for pills or syringes etc, I don't find recreational drug users attractive. Similarly for being drunk.
Wrong. And UBI sucks unless you include an expansive social safety net too
It's actually illegal to do this. Only allowed if absolutely unavoidable.
Ain’t nothin good enough for her
Do not use logic dude. Not cool.
I would not recommend contacting her. That would probably creep her out.
It’s not satisfying at all. If this wasn’t [NAME] it wouldn’t be popular. Interesting timing considering the [NAME] debacle too.
No. You're not the only one.
I’m not a fan of that hire at all... I’m also not a fan about how that all came out. All around bad.
I do not disagree with any of this. Good take, sir.
I’m only denying what’s not true, and [NAME] being my name isn’t true.
No you don't. The average opinion of ISIS for example is way below zero.
The paradox is not working, then also collecting entitlements is still theft.
